docs.name: create-app
docs.title: Creating a new application
docs.text: Download the below GIT repo as a zip file and pull _master file into a local folder to get started.  The link provided is a GIT repo to use when creating a new application. The video shows how to do this.

docs.text: After creating an app, you will want to update the home page.

docs.name: overview
docs.title: Javascript Overview
docs.text: Some stuff you'll want to know about JavaScript and how this application uses jQuery, the DOM and selectors.

docs.name: bubble
docs.title: Javascript Code Bubble
docs.text: The code bubble allows you to code in a way that both provides local variables and protected global space to make your code safer and easier to code.

docs.name: selectors
docs.title: jQuery and Selectors
docs.text: A few keys pints about jQuery, selectors and the DOM

docs.name: patterns
docs.title: A few JavaScript patterns
docs.text: Design patterns used in this application

docs.name: overview
docs.title: Libraries Overview
docs.text: These are libraries included in and used by this application model.

docs.name: semantic
docs.title: Semantic UI
docs.text: Semantic UI is the UI library used for a majority of the HTML and related CSS.

docs.name: datatables
docs.title: DataTables
docs.text: DataTables is the stanard library used for tables with sortable columns, search capabilities, etc.

docs.name: handlebars
docs.title: Handlebars
docs.text: Handlebars is the templating engine provided by and used in the system.

docs.name: layout
docs.title: UI Layout
docs.text: The UI Layout library is used to create a border layout.  Used on every page - packed with available features.

docs.name: contextmenu
docs.title: ContextMenu
docs.text: ContextMenu is used to create right click menus.  Not highly used at this time, not great for native mobile.

docs.name: ace
docs.title: Ace - JSON / Code Editor
docs.text: The Ace - JSON / Code Editor is a great tool for showing, editing JSON and code.
